00100         public XElement ToXElement()
00101         {
00102             XElement temp = new XElement("Position");
00103             temp.SetAttributeValue("number", OrdinalNumber);
00104             temp.SetAttributeValue("latitude", Latitude);
00105             temp.SetAttributeValue("longitude", Longitude);
00106             temp.SetAttributeValue("tripid", TripID);
00107             temp.SetAttributeValue("speed", Speed);
00108             //temp.SetAttributeValue("time", CreationTime);
00109             //temp.SetAttributeValue("time", CreationTime.ToBinary());
00110             temp.SetAttributeValue("time", CreationTime.ToString("yyyyMMddHHmmss"));
00111             temp.SetAttributeValue("description", Description);
00112             return temp;
00113         }
